articles.headline: Wrestling giants
articles.summary: An investigative piece exploring the controversial practices of Columbia/HCA, detailing their aggressive strategies and questionable practices in pursuit of profit in the American health care system.

articles.headline: Sudden Seizures
articles.summary: An investigation uncovering illegal practices by a Louisiana sheriff's department, including misuse of drug forfeiture funds for personal luxury trips.

articles.headline: System protecting military malpractice
articles.summary: An in-depth report into the flaws within the military health care system, showing systemic issues that protect against malpractice claims.

articles.headline: Undeserved overtime
articles.summary: A report on widespread abuse of overtime pay claims within the Metro Dade Police, exposing a systemic avenue of corruption involving court appearances.
